ValidationRule.description: Prevents Sales from Editing the Application while the application is in a status that is owned by Credit.
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( BEGINS($UserRole.Name,"WES"), CONTAINS($UserRole.Name,"Sales") || CONTAINS($UserRole.Name,"sales"), Application_Status_Team__c = "Credit", AND( ISCHANGED(Application_Status__c), TEXT(PRIORVALUE(Application_Status__c)) <> "Draft", TEXT(PRIORVALUE(Application_Status__c)) <> "Awaiting Security Check", TEXT(PRIORVALUE(Application_Status__c)) <> "Sales to Obtain Further Information" ) )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Sales can't edit this Application because it is set to a status that only Credit can edit.
